name: Sour Apple Martini
description: Before the Cosmo took over the Soure Apple Martini was a huge cocktail stateside where it often consisted of simple vodka, sour apple liqueur and lime cordial
directions: Place a cherry into each of two 4-ounce martini glasses; set aside.
In a cocktail shaker, combine schnapps and vodka. Add ice cubes to fill shaker half full; shake until very cold.
Strain vodka mixture into the prepared martini glasses. Fill glasses with lemon-lime carbonated beverage.
